title: Camellia
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/P1ax7BQEWEH7V7LOfTFnq.png?height=633&width=500)

Recently, I read the masterpiece "La Traviata" by Mr. Dumas, a famous French writer in the 19th century, and sighed deeply. I have to admit: people who have been in love always have a deeper understanding of the hardships and sweetness of pursuing love than those who have never been in love. The first time I read "La Traviata" was in 2000, and that was when I couldn't understand the unforgettable true love and encounter between the son and the prostitute in "La Traviata", and I didn't have much sympathy for Margaret.

After reading this again, there are two gains. One is to fully understand the crazy words and behaviors of men and women in love, and to understand the true meaning of true love. The second is to deeply recognize the cruelty and cruelty of the real society, and deplore the heroine's experience very much, and also hate the society that made her suffer this kind of experience.

Mr. Dumas' description of young people's love psychology and behavior is very delicate and true, which can evoke the warm and crazy memories of men and women who have long been numb in their marriages when they were in love.

Mr. Armand, a 24-year-old male protagonist who just graduated with the help of his parents, met a Parisian socialite by chance, a 22-year-old beautiful girl who was born in a poor village and had to come to Paris to seek a life. Grete, deeply attracted by her beauty and holy appearance, fell in love with her at first sight, and did not despise her because of her prostitute status, and insisted on meeting and dating according to solemn etiquette. Through half a year of anonymously caring and visiting the sick Margaret, he won the sincere love of Margaret, who was lonely and painful on the outside. However, because of the huge debt owed by Margaret because of the luxurious life in the past, she cannot be the mistress of several noble sons at the same time, in order to obtain funds to repay the debt and maintain the current decent life. This made Armand, who wanted to monopolize Marguerite's love but had no financial strength to save his beloved woman, was very jealous and bitter. He was helpless and complained about himself. He had many conflicts with Marguerite, misunderstood and hurt her many times, but soon Regret the pain and feel that Margaret should not be blamed. Men and women in love always hurt those they love.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xWKQFkMfVPtf-KyOYkD_m.png?height=420&width=640)

Margaret understands love, her love is deep, she knows that loving someone is not only about taking and controlling, but also about tolerance and sacrifice. This stubborn girl's relationship with Armand has nothing to do with money, and she didn't ask Armand for a penny. In order to give Armand a pure love, Margaret made a huge sacrifice. After refusing to communicate with the old Duke and Count G and losing the source of funds, in order to repay the huge debt, in order not to put Armand's economic pressure, she resolutely bid farewell to the past. Living a life of luxury and beauty, Dian sold her carriage, diamonds, jewelry and furniture, and wanted to settle in the country with Armand through thick and thin.

However, cruel society and secular prejudice will not allow a prostitute who pursues true love and is dedicated to goodness to become a new person. Happiness is always short, and suffering is always long. While they were planning a bright future in the Paris countryside, the fatherly and admirable M. Duval (Father Armand) came to Paris with worldly pressures to force the two to part. After being rejected by his son Armand, the old father found Marguerite. Our understanding girl, after realizing the painstaking care and pleading of her old father, made the decision to sacrifice herself to fulfill her lover - she painfully and deliberately communicated with the duke and the count again, and wrote a letter of refusal to reject Armand's request. Feelings, in order to achieve the purpose of causing Armand's hatred, despair and forgetting towards her. Armand, our heartbroken and desperate, lost his mind, bred hatred, and resorted to many measures, including making out and cohabiting with a prostitute in front of Marguerite, to avenge her "betrayal of love", let us poor girl She was severely mentally tortured to the point that she had to paralyze her soul through indulgence and alcoholism, which seriously damaged her already weak body. As a result, within three months, Armand, who she missed day and night, left Paris to go out to perform. During this period, poor Margaret died because of severe lung disease and coughing up blood.

What touched me the most was: our tolerant and kind Marguerite, she did not blame Armand for misunderstanding and hurt her, she endured it silently, and she expressed all her affection for Armand in the writings she wrote when she was increasingly ill. in the diary. She told Armand: "In those days you came up with something new to insult me ​​every day, insults that I could say happily accepted, because apart from the fact that they were proof that you always loved me, I seemed to feel The more you torture me, the more noble I will appear in your eyes when you know the truth."

When Armand, who was traveling, returned to Paris to receive the news of Margaret's death and those deplorable diaries, he understood everything and deeply regretted his selfishness and recklessness. What a sighing story, what a touching love story. As the lyrics of "Later" wrote: "Later, I finally learned how to love. It's a pity that you have long gone and disappeared into the sea of ​​people. Later, I finally realized in tears that some people will never stop once they miss them."

It is a little gratifying that our hero, M. Armand, is not as ruthless and indifferent as those aristocratic sons who have enjoyed Marguerite's body when they learn that she is seriously ill and has no entertainment value, but repents of herself. fault and try to make amends for the deceased lover. He traveled to Paris and Margaret's hometown while sick, and with the authorization of her relatives, he bought a permanent cemetery for the poor girl, and entrusted the cemetery administrator to buy a bunch of Margaret's favorite camellias to sacrifice to her every day. 's grave.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HI950rnrICuHIMKnGiuZn.png?height=910&width=700)

"This feeling can be reminisced, but it was lost at the time." Young people, cherish your lover, believe in your lover, understand your lover, be tolerant of your lover, don't hurt him (her) easily, and don't let people have a grudge for life!

### 第六篇20220717

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】解读 $DAI - 不要让它成为 Wrapped $USDC

【核心内容简介】

MakerDAO 是一个 DeFi 借贷协议，提供两款产品：超额抵押贷款和稳定币 $DAI。借款人存入符合条件的加密抵押品，MakerDAO 将发放 $DAI 计价的贷款。作者从资产负债表变化的角度为我们梳理了 $DAI 的发展脉络。

最初协议以借贷为主体，资产负债表相对简单，即抵押贷款是资产，$DAI 是负债。需要注意 MakerDAO 没有将1 $DAI 换成1美元的法律义务。$DAI 由加密货币超额抵押贷款支持，再与1美元挂钩。

其后协议更新锚定稳定模块（Peg Stability Module, PSM），强化 $DAI 与美元币值的挂钩。这也更新了资产负债表，在资产方面除以 $DAI 计价的加密资产抵押贷款外，还增加了法定稳定币资产。在负债方面，$DAI 仍是协议的负债，由稳定币资产和加密抵押贷款共同支持。

最近协议通过 DAO 治理提案并设计信托结构来间接持有国债，在资产负债表上为 $DAI 增持了现实世界的资产与负债，有效降低了法定稳定币的敞口风险且提高了自身的盈利能力。

作者认为 $DAI 有潜力成长为真正去中心化 DAO 治理的法定稳定币，这是目前仍旧存在交易对手风险的主流中心化法定稳定币种 $USDT 和 $USDC 所不具备的优势，进而相信市场对 MakerDAO 存在价值重估的可能。

【个人思考】

$DAI 作为目前最主要的 DAO 治理类型的稳定币，补齐了缺少现实法币稳定性支持的短板，同时还具备避免中心化实体信任问题的优势，理论上有一定的发展前景。不过，中心化的法定稳定币也需要辩证看待：信任问题自诞生便潜伏，但是强力背书与资源推动却也主导了现阶段的市场份额。而且，倘若爆发中心化的交易对手风险，必然引起加密货币市场的剧烈动荡，由此会带来极高的不确定性，便不能算作好契机。由此，未来更期望看到去中心化法定稳定币的另辟蹊径，相信会是一条十分有趣的道路。

【相关链接】

[https://tokeninsight.com/zh/research/analysts-pick/understanding-dai-let-it-not-be-wrapped-usdc-anymore](https://tokeninsight.com/zh/research/analysts-pick/understanding-dai-let-it-not-be-wrapped-usdc-anymore)

### 第七篇20220718

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】SocialFi 深度解析：从当前市场，看未来 SocialFi 的发展

【核心内容简介】

### 现实需求

社交赛道有着巨大的市场容量，平台记录用户流量、画像和行为数据，蕴含巨大的商业价值但目前却被传统巨头公司掌控着几乎所有数据，这对用户非常不公平。传统社交产品历经了四十余年的发展，伴随网络硬件设施的升级和移动通信技术的发展不断推进社交网络的演化。数据是现有和可见未来人类社会中最主要的生产资料之一，也是反向撬动生产力的源泉。Web 3.0 改变了数据生产资料的所有权，让生产资料回归到真实生产者，进而改变社会生产关系。Web 3.0 SocialFi 将去中心化的社交和金融向结合，相比较于 Web 2.0 Social 更加强调个人影响力与变现价值，有助于打破平台垄断、消除单点风险，在全球数字经济系统的浪潮中创造全新业务模式和产品类别。

### 构建现况

去中心化的计算、存储和隐私保护是 Web 3.0 SocialFi 的关键底层设施，目前在三层设施之上已构筑起一定规模的生态。

中间件 Chainfeeds、Mask Network：Bridge 层主要以混合形态出现，既满足用户在 Web 2.0 产品使用习惯，同时也作为用户进入 Web 3.0 世界的桥梁。

公链层 Deso：建设专用于社交协议的 L1 区块链，借助链上数据的开放性、吸引开发者构建新社交应用，实现生态内的应用数据共享。

协议层 BBS Network、Cyberconnect、Lens Protocol、RSS3：共同点在于注重用户主权。

应用层 Rally.io、Nansen Connect、Mirror.xyz、Monaco Planet、Friends With Benefits、Whale：更注重现实落地，协助创作主体完成更高的价值变现。

### 发展困局

底层端：基础设施比如跨链技术、分布式存储、隐私计算等还没有完全成熟，也没有完善的跨链解决方案；社交用户迁移成本极高，用户体量还未到达爆发临界点。

Social 需求端：缺乏社交归属感；社交协议不成熟；隐私保护不完善。

DeFi 需求端：底层商业模式不成熟；用户公平性需要重新定义；价值捕获和激励方式有待完善。

### 发展破局

1）使用成本低，普通用户可以承受；

2）带给用户不逊色于 Web 2.0 的产品体验，上手使用门槛低，产品功能完善并且有创新；

3）用户数据同步及时全面（可集成链上和链下）；

4）创新的市场营销策略，有快速传播机制；

5）平衡合理的 Token 经济，可以在生态中充分发挥 Token 的作用 ；

6）持续的激励机制和成熟的社区运营来加强用户粘性；

7）与其他赛道的协议打通，赋能更多的场景；

8）满足 Web 3.0 原生需求，而非仅解决 Web 2.0 需求。

### 展望未来

Web 3.0 社交可以解决 Web 2.0 社交存在的数据所有权问题、数据隐私问题和利益分配问题。在 Web 3.0 信息自由和信息确权的浪潮中，用户可以自己掌握内容的所有权而以不依赖中心化平台；传统身份 ID 体系是邮箱账号、用户名密码和真实用户信息，而 Web 3.0 的 ID 体系需要关注 DID 和 SBT 可能在未来实现真正的灵魂绑定。

值得关注的还有：公链层生态及其潜在价值；Bridge 层基于链和 Dapp 的交互，通用的 DID 或 SBT 在未来帮助更多用户从 Web 2.0 带入 Web 3.0 时代；协议层基于链下和链上数据，用户获取更高价值的专属画像；应用层注重实现成员之间的价值连接，通过兴趣发现和垂直社区，完善社交图谱。

当前的大多数 SocialFi 产品只能满足 Crypto Native 用户纯链上的社交+金融需求，未来需要广泛普及且能同时满足链上和映射链下真实世界社交+金融需求的 SocialFi 产品，可以帮助用户将社交融入到生活的方方面面，当令人愉悦的 SocialFi 与基本的人际关系巧妙地结合在一起时，Web 3.0 会变得更加强大，最终以更为真实和积极的方式在这个世界构建相互的联系。

【个人思考】

Web 3.0 SocialFi 在未来有着无可估量的发展潜能，现阶段在公链层、协议层和应用层的生态构建只能说是初具雏形，破局成熟完备的 Web 2.0 体系仍需极强的吸引力与极大的契机。

title: NFT是好的投資還是騙局
body:
2022年五、六月這段時間，幣圈經歷了大幅崩跌。中間發生了Luna幣與UST算法穩定幣事件，還有知名加密貨幣借貸平台Celsius毫無預警宣布暫停用戶提款，讓市場瀰漫著恐慌情緒。加上美股下跌的影響，比特幣、以太幣分別跌破$20,000美金，和$1,000美金以下。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iTzdmoOptQFb0UGdDuu1y.jpg?height=1078&width=1920)

幣圈這波浪潮的影響下，NFT市場也受到許多影響。不過就如股神巴菲特(Warren Buffett)說過：「只有退潮的時候，你才知道誰在裸泳。」好的藍籌(Blue chip)項目如CryptoPunks、BAYC、CLONE X……等，其實相對保值，反而受幣價波動較小。

在這熊市之中，樂觀來說，其實這是最好的學習機會，可以藉此了解更多幣圈的知識。唯有知識，才能讓自己不會盲從別人的意見，可以做出對自己最好的選擇。有人常問一個好的NFT項目要如何知道？其實我們可以直接從成功的項目來做歸納，會發現最主要的三個影響原因，團隊、社群、路線圖。

`(1)團隊 Team`

團隊就是NFT項目最好的背書，通常會希望看到有使用真名的團隊，會給支持的人比較多的背書和信心。很多項目一出來就很多人搶，很多時候都是因為團隊之前有過成功的項目。反之，團隊有過捲款跑路(Rug and Pull)事件，大家也就敬而遠之。

`(2)社群 Community`

大部分NFT項目建立的社群主要在Twitter和Discord上。建議要瞭解一個項目最快方法，是直接到Discord裏面跟人聊天互動，查看話題是什麼，是對於項目的支持喜歡，又或是大家只想來撈一筆就走人。這些因數都會決定參與項目走不走的遠。

`(3)路線圖 Roadmap`

路線圖就像是公司目前和未來的發展藍圖，讓持有NFT的人知道項目發展和得到哪些賦能，給予的可能是未來的NFT空投、或是虛擬、實體物品兌換……等等。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/naYuNptEandDJQo1RUI_i.jpg?height=2400&width=3600)

而這邊想介紹一家台灣的新創區塊鏈公司－優勢富宇公司，即將在7/11推出公司的AT-NFT。依照以上成功的NFT三點因素來看，團隊就是公司本身背書，相對的讓人比較放心。社群部分，公司也有專門團隊來經營，不過要再觀察後續熱度。至於路線圖，看得出來NFT項目會是跟著公司發展一起前進。最後，要提醒大家投資任何項目，都要做好自己的功課(DYOR)。

想學習NFT社群常用術語，可以參考此[文章](https://mirror.xyz/ckuang28.eth/B-qR0z3DPnyKNEJD7R6ldOP-N9JLh_VPZ3FnQzvyRfA)。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ijFH6b4VdAc13iYEmqanC.jpeg?height=720&width=1280)

[https://crossing.cw.com.tw/article/16263](https://crossing.cw.com.tw/article/16263)

### 第六篇20220717

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】解读 $DAI - 不要让它成为 Wrapped $USDC

【核心内容简介】

MakerDAO 是一个 DeFi 借贷协议，提供两款产品：超额抵押贷款和稳定币 $DAI。借款人存入符合条件的加密抵押品，MakerDAO 将发放 $DAI 计价的贷款。作者从资产负债表变化的角度为我们梳理了 $DAI 的发展脉络。

最初协议以借贷为主体，资产负债表相对简单，即抵押贷款是资产，$DAI 是负债。需要注意 MakerDAO 没有将1 $DAI 换成1美元的法律义务。$DAI 由加密货币超额抵押贷款支持，再与1美元挂钩。

其后协议更新锚定稳定模块（Peg Stability Module, PSM），强化 $DAI 与美元币值的挂钩。这也更新了资产负债表，在资产方面除以 $DAI 计价的加密资产抵押贷款外，还增加了法定稳定币资产。在负债方面，$DAI 仍是协议的负债，由稳定币资产和加密抵押贷款共同支持。

最近协议通过 DAO 治理提案并设计信托结构来间接持有国债，在资产负债表上为 $DAI 增持了现实世界的资产与负债，有效降低了法定稳定币的敞口风险且提高了自身的盈利能力。

作者认为 $DAI 有潜力成长为真正去中心化 DAO 治理的法定稳定币，这是目前仍旧存在交易对手风险的主流中心化法定稳定币种 $USDT 和 $USDC 所不具备的优势，进而相信市场对 MakerDAO 存在价值重估的可能。

【个人思考】

$DAI 作为目前最主要的 DAO 治理类型的稳定币，补齐了缺少现实法币稳定性支持的短板，同时还具备避免中心化实体信任问题的优势，理论上有一定的发展前景。不过，中心化的法定稳定币也需要辩证看待：信任问题自诞生便潜伏，但是强力背书与资源推动却也主导了现阶段的市场份额。而且，倘若爆发中心化的交易对手风险，必然引起加密货币市场的剧烈动荡，由此会带来极高的不确定性，便不能算作好契机。由此，未来更期望看到去中心化法定稳定币的另辟蹊径，相信会是一条十分有趣的道路。

【相关链接】

[https://tokeninsight.com/zh/research/analysts-pick/understanding-dai-let-it-not-be-wrapped-usdc-anymore](https://tokeninsight.com/zh/research/analysts-pick/understanding-dai-let-it-not-be-wrapped-usdc-anymore)

### 第七篇20220718

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】SocialFi 深度解析：从当前市场，看未来 SocialFi 的发展

【核心内容简介】

### 现实需求

社交赛道有着巨大的市场容量，平台记录用户流量、画像和行为数据，蕴含巨大的商业价值但目前却被传统巨头公司掌控着几乎所有数据，这对用户非常不公平。传统社交产品历经了四十余年的发展，伴随网络硬件设施的升级和移动通信技术的发展不断推进社交网络的演化。数据是现有和可见未来人类社会中最主要的生产资料之一，也是反向撬动生产力的源泉。Web 3.0 改变了数据生产资料的所有权，让生产资料回归到真实生产者，进而改变社会生产关系。Web 3.0 SocialFi 将去中心化的社交和金融向结合，相比较于 Web 2.0 Social 更加强调个人影响力与变现价值，有助于打破平台垄断、消除单点风险，在全球数字经济系统的浪潮中创造全新业务模式和产品类别。

### 构建现况

去中心化的计算、存储和隐私保护是 Web 3.0 SocialFi 的关键底层设施，目前在三层设施之上已构筑起一定规模的生态。

中间件 Chainfeeds、Mask Network：Bridge 层主要以混合形态出现，既满足用户在 Web 2.0 产品使用习惯，同时也作为用户进入 Web 3.0 世界的桥梁。

公链层 Deso：建设专用于社交协议的 L1 区块链，借助链上数据的开放性、吸引开发者构建新社交应用，实现生态内的应用数据共享。

协议层 BBS Network、Cyberconnect、Lens Protocol、RSS3：共同点在于注重用户主权。

应用层 Rally.io、Nansen Connect、Mirror.xyz、Monaco Planet、Friends With Benefits、Whale：更注重现实落地，协助创作主体完成更高的价值变现。

### 发展困局

底层端：基础设施比如跨链技术、分布式存储、隐私计算等还没有完全成熟，也没有完善的跨链解决方案；社交用户迁移成本极高，用户体量还未到达爆发临界点。

Social 需求端：缺乏社交归属感；社交协议不成熟；隐私保护不完善。

DeFi 需求端：底层商业模式不成熟；用户公平性需要重新定义；价值捕获和激励方式有待完善。

### 发展破局

1）使用成本低，普通用户可以承受；

2）带给用户不逊色于 Web 2.0 的产品体验，上手使用门槛低，产品功能完善并且有创新；

3）用户数据同步及时全面（可集成链上和链下）；

4）创新的市场营销策略，有快速传播机制；

5）平衡合理的 Token 经济，可以在生态中充分发挥 Token 的作用 ；

6）持续的激励机制和成熟的社区运营来加强用户粘性；

7）与其他赛道的协议打通，赋能更多的场景；

8）满足 Web 3.0 原生需求，而非仅解决 Web 2.0 需求。

### 展望未来

Web 3.0 社交可以解决 Web 2.0 社交存在的数据所有权问题、数据隐私问题和利益分配问题。在 Web 3.0 信息自由和信息确权的浪潮中，用户可以自己掌握内容的所有权而以不依赖中心化平台；传统身份 ID 体系是邮箱账号、用户名密码和真实用户信息，而 Web 3.0 的 ID 体系需要关注 DID 和 SBT 可能在未来实现真正的灵魂绑定。

值得关注的还有：公链层生态及其潜在价值；Bridge 层基于链和 Dapp 的交互，通用的 DID 或 SBT 在未来帮助更多用户从 Web 2.0 带入 Web 3.0 时代；协议层基于链下和链上数据，用户获取更高价值的专属画像；应用层注重实现成员之间的价值连接，通过兴趣发现和垂直社区，完善社交图谱。

当前的大多数 SocialFi 产品只能满足 Crypto Native 用户纯链上的社交+金融需求，未来需要广泛普及且能同时满足链上和映射链下真实世界社交+金融需求的 SocialFi 产品，可以帮助用户将社交融入到生活的方方面面，当令人愉悦的 SocialFi 与基本的人际关系巧妙地结合在一起时，Web 3.0 会变得更加强大，最终以更为真实和积极的方式在这个世界构建相互的联系。

【个人思考】

Web 3.0 SocialFi 在未来有着无可估量的发展潜能，但现阶段在公链层、协议层和应用层的生态构建只能说是初具雏形，想要破局成熟完备的 Web 2.0 体系仍需极强的实力与更好的契机。

title: 人生，无需刻意，做好自己就好
body:
人生在世，从来就没有绝对的完美，有的只是一颗懂得包容的心。只有你懂得了如何去包容，才能在现实的世界中遇见相对的完美。人生路漫漫，不要活在别人的思想观念之中，应该学会活在自我的内心世界里，做好自己，其它的随缘而行。

在生活中，无论为人还是处世，只要做到问心无愧，即使别人恶语相向、百般刁难，我们也要保持自我的淡定与从容。凡事尽力而为， 心安即是归处。

人生路上，无论你做得多么完美，不可能让所有人都满意。所以，我们应该学会淡化外在的影响，以追求自我的内心为根本，走好自己该走的路，过好自己的生活就好。

在生活中，我们总想着如何去改变世界，但现实总是残酷的，当我们无法改变世界时，我也不要被世界所改变，一定要坚定自我的初心，坚守自我的原则，只有这样，我们才能活出自己该有的价值。

人生路上，有很多东西就像握在手中的沙子，你越是用力，它流失的速度就越快，只有你懂得放开，才能尽可能地得到。“有心栽花花不开，无心插柳柳成荫。”有时候的刻意为之，却是满树凋零；有时候的无心之举，却是硕果累累。做好自己，该来的总会来的。

人生归根结底还是自己的，与其以别人为生活的导向，不如回归本真的自我。

title: An Overview of Coca-Cola's Entrance Into web3
body:
## Overview

Coca-Cola has an active web3 presence, and the brand is making a point to consolidate customer online experiences with their proprietary Coca-Cola app. The brand has a strong web2 presence, with philanthropy being a consistent theme with their Coca-Cola Give® portal. Sustainability, sports partnerships, and mental health awareness are three consistent themes through Coke’s brand style and storytelling.

## Initiatives

***Coca-Cola app (web2)*:** Coca-Cola app is a customer loyalty program to ‘unlock refreshing surprises and redeem rewards—all at your fingertips’. Customers primarily interact with Coke’s loyalty program through the *Coca-Cola* app for iOS/Android. Coca-Cola app offerings include scanning icons on Coca-Cola packaging to earn ‘rewards and access personalized experiences’. Customers can create their own custom beverage mixes via Coca-Cola Freestyle®, and can receive location-based rewards and offers at theaters and restaurants.

**Coca-Cola Insiders Club:** Insider’s Club was a box subscription service that Coca-Cola tested as a service from January 2021 to March 2021. Each box featured three new or limited edition products before they hit shelves nationwide. Swag, and ‘exclusive virtual experiences with a celebrity’ were included with every box each month. The membership was paid upfront, with a 3-month subscription costing $45 plus tax and included free shipping.

***The Friendship Box NFT*:** The Friendship Box NFT is Coca-Cola’s first foray into NFT web3 culture. On July 30th, 2021, four unique Coca-Cola NFTs were up for auction as a single ‘loot box’, for sale on Opensea.io. All proceeds for the sale went to Special Olympics International, a longtime partner of Coca-Cola. Auctioned as one lot, the collection features multi-sensory NFTs housed inside a ‘Friendship Box’. Coca-Cola’s Josh Schwarber explains, “The metaverse—which is borderless and ‘geo-less’—creates opportunities to connect with others like never before. We didn’t want to do this just to make an NFT. We wanted to inject the core principles of Coca-Cola and celebrate both our heritage and ties to friendship, while also doing something that hasn’t been done before.”

The Friendship Box acts as a dynamic loot box that contains the following:

* Physical: The winning bidder received a real-life SMEG FAB28 Coca-Cola fridge, stocked with ice-cold Coke.
* Digital: A custom-designed Coca-Cola Bubble jacket wearable, which included an unlockable version that can be worn in Decentraland. A Sound Visualizer NFT included the ‘unmistakable fizz of a Coke’ complete with visual effects. Lastly, ‘The Friendship Card’ refreshes 1948 artwork used in a set of Coca-Cola trading cards from the 1990s symbolizing friendship and refreshment. The metaverse-influenced iteration of the cards add motion, light and 3D features.

**Coca-Cola Snow Globes:** Coca-Cola partnered with VeVe (a popular digital collectable app) to release a collection of Christmas themed digital collectables. This drop included the classic Polar Bear, Coke Bottles, Neon Coca-Cola sign, and a singular Coke bottle. Each drop had a different list price, rarity level, and number of collectables available to purchase. VeVe is being used to simplify the process of purchasing and using NFTs.

**Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Byte:** Coca-Cola recently announced it is launching a gaming-inspired version of a virtual Coke beverage, surrounding the Coca-Cola Starlight release. The first video game it will be available in will be Fortnite. Coke has teamed up with gaming organization PWR to help with the creation of Pixel Point, a custom island built in Fortnite Creative. Fortnite Creative is a separate mode within Fortnite that allows companies and players to build their own custom worlds. Once players enter Pixel Point, they can try out coke-themed mini-games, as well as ‘try’ the new drink flavors.

**The Coca-Cola Combo Burger Day Collection:** This International Burger Day (May 28th), Coca-Cola dropped more than 4000 free, unique digital collectables celebrating the classic combination of an ice-cold Coca-Cola and a burger hot off the grill. Every Coca-Cola combo comes in a mysterious red bag and inside each bag you’ll find a generative burger with varying traits to satisfy every taste, and a classic bottle of Coca-Cola Zero that goes with every single one. This release was as floppy as a barely cooked burger, with virtually zero traction or interest from anyone.

**Coca-Cola Pride Collection**: The Coca-Cola Pride collection is a series of 136 digital collectibles made in celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community. The limited edition pieces feature an exclusive take on the iconic Coca-Cola bottle with artwork by Rich Mnisi, fashion designer and leading campaigner for LGBTQIA+ rights in South Africa. His commissioned design has been sliced into individual fragments and dispersed across all 136 collectibles, making each one unique. The collection aims to shine color-filled light on the LGBTQIA+ community's members and spread a message of Love. This collection was released on Polygon and currently has a low floor price and total volume.

![Four different ways how not to release a branded NFT collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RSJZ07igKc1XkpGXT1qre.webp?height=767&width=767)

## POS System

Coca-Cola partnered with connectivity platform Omnivore to create a digital marketplace that makes it easier for customers to order Coke products through a Menu Management System (MMS) . MMS helps restaurant brands manage the complexity of numerous digital menus across online ordering, third-party apps, menu boards, kiosks, and more. MMS integrates the POS system, resulting in order injection, data collection, and control of content. This can allow for immediate pricing updates, deeper analytics, and easier surcharging.

USD is the only accepted currency on Coca-Cola’s website for US customers. Coca-Cola’s website allows for SSO via Google, Facebook, and Apple. The login for Coca-Cola’s website is the same as the app. Payment methods include traditional credit cards, Google Pay, and Paypal.

Accepted payment methods:
Visa
Mastercard
American Express
Discover
Paypal
Apple Pay
Google Pay

## Discord Info

Coca-Cola does not have an official Discord server.

## Tech Stack

Ethereum self-custody digital wallets 
 [Opensea.io](http://Opensea.io) NFT store (customers pay with ETH)
Regular eCommerce payment portals
Medium social media presence (Instagram, Twitter, TikTok)
Dynamic websites, utilizing CSS, JSON, and React JS
Unknown how the iOS app was built or what tech it incorporates

## NFT Stats (for Friendship Box)

ETH Contract: 0x455f04c9C54fFfa699e9F6b1271E857A1f2bDdfa
Blockchain: ETH
Token Standard: ERC-721
Creator Royalties: 10.0% (Creator/Coca-Cola gets paid 10% of sales on secondary market)

## Metrics

Because of the lack of data available from Coca-Cola’s NFT launches, Opensea’s Price History was used in favor of Dune.xyz. These metrics are included below. The metrics for more recent collections were so unimpressive and low (sub 1ETH total volume) that making a dashboard for the collections seemed like a waste of time.

## Secondary Market Analytics

(Secondary sales for Coca-Cola are the same as the original price of the only NFT sold traditionally on [Opensea.io](http://Opensea.io). The wallet that purchased the original Friendship Box NFT has not sold it yet.)

Current floor price: 217.4541 ETH
Top price: 217.4541 ETH
Average Price: 217.4541 ETH
Median Price: 217.4541 ETH

Past 7 Day Volume: 0
Past 24H Volume: 0
Past 7 Day Sales: 0 NFT Sales

## Virtual/In-Person Events

* Coca-Cola has the World of Coca-Cola museum in Atlanta Georgia, showcasing the history of the company, as well as the Biedenharn Coca-Cola museum that serves as the original Coca-Cola bottling facility
* On International Friendship Day, Coca-Cola sponsored a ‘can-top’ party within Decentraland that was available for anyone, regardless of owning a particular NFT
* There have been no in-person events for NFT holders
* In 2022, Coca-Cola hopes to incorporate more digital experiences into their brand, with their ‘Coca-Cola Starlight’ digital collectables

## Brand Analysis

Strengths

* Has begun to embrace web3 and NFTs, using the latter as a way to promote its philanthropic ideals
* Released two different NFT collections on two separate platforms ([Opensea.io](http://Opensea.io) and VeVe), which garnered considerable hype online and generated more interest in NFTs from non-crypto consumers
* Hosted an event on Decentraland. Not NFT gated, but showing initiative and interest in the metaverse
* Is capitalizing on the nostalgic nature of the Coca-Cola brand, through NFTs and social media

Weaknesses

* Coke has made a greater effort than other soft drink brands to dabble in web3, but could be offering a lot more given the sheer breadth of the IP. Every single release has been a flop
* Needs a bigger tech team focused on NFTs and metaverse content to stay competitive and roll out new offerings quicker; Coke needs to stop releasing boring NFT collections
* There are little to no notable utilities associated with the NFTs offered, and the only notable NFT offered was sold at a price that is entirely unaffordable and unrealistic for the average consumer
* Little to no incorporation of the metaverse events or NFTs on the main website; no mention of web3 offerings on the Coca-Cola app
* IP is interested in web3 but at this point has invested very little and is cautious to invest more time and energy into the space

Opportunities

* Is easily one of the largest and most successful companies in the world, with a brand so recognizable it is hard to think of anything more cemented in American culture
* The first NFT launch was met with a ton of interest and bidding from ardent fans; Coca-Cola can recover from a poor launch in ways other brands cannot
* Digital brands are eager to partner with Coca-Cola, and the brand is being selective on how they proceed in the market

Threats

* The lack of a Coca-Cola Discord server means that any comparable competitor could beat them in the social media space just by appealing to younger audiences
* Other major soda brands could just as easily and quickly embrace web3. Nothing Coke has done is not replicable by other brands
* The success or failure of VeVe as the established and primary online platform for digital collectables could sway Coke from pursuing NFTs more seriously. VeVe was exploited in March of 2022, with the in-app token being acquired illegally by hackers. This has caused increased skepticism of the long-term viability of the VeVe platform
* Waiting for the right moment to embrace the metaverse more strongly just means another brand may take their place and gain popularity online-Repeated flops could turn long-term web3 investors away permanently

## Summary

Coca-Cola is a legendary brand that is beginning to embrace web3 and finding unique ways to incorporate it into its brand IP. Although Coke has been slow to roll-out new NFT and metaverse offerings, previous releases have been well received by the public and have not induced backlash. Coca-Cola Combo Burger Day and LGBTQIA+ releases were to practically zero fanfare, with some of the lowest floor prices seen for a major brand (consequently also on Polygon). The Coca-Cola app shows no signs of incorporating cryptocurrency or NFTs anytime soon, which could mean that full adoption for the brand is some time away. It is difficult to derive the metrics from Coke’s VeVe release, given the closed nature of the platform. With a solid IP and impressive annual gross profit, Coke can take the time it needs to decide how best to proceed in the web3 market.

The metaverse-influenced iteration of the cards add motion, light and 3D features.

**Coca-Cola Snow Globes:** Coca-Cola partnered with VeVe (a popular digital collectable app) to release a collection of Christmas themed digital collectables. This drop included the classic Polar Bear, Coke Bottles, Neon Coca-Cola sign, and a singular Coke bottle. Each drop had a different list price, rarity level, and number of collectables available to purchase. VeVe is being used to simplify the process of purchasing and using NFTs.

**Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Byte:** Coca-Cola recently announced it is launching a gaming-inspired version of a virtual Coke beverage, surrounding the Coca-Cola Starlight release. The first video game it will be available in will be Fortnite. Coke has teamed up with gaming organization PWR to help with the creation of Pixel Point, a custom island built in Fortnite Creative. Fortnite Creative is a separate mode within Fortnite that allows companies and players to build their own custom worlds. Once players enter Pixel Point, they can try out coke-themed mini-games, as well as ‘try’ the new drink flavors.

**The Coca-Cola Combo Burger Day Collection:** This International Burger Day (May 28th), Coca-Cola dropped more than 4000 free, unique digital collectables celebrating the classic combination of an ice-cold Coca-Cola and a burger hot off the grill. Every Coca-Cola combo comes in a mysterious red bag and inside each bag you’ll find a generative burger with varying traits to satisfy every taste, and a classic bottle of Coca-Cola Zero that goes with every single one. This release was as floppy as a barely cooked burger, with virtually zero traction or interest from anyone.

**Coca-Cola Pride Collection**: The Coca-Cola Pride collection is a series of 136 digital collectibles made in celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community. The limited edition pieces feature an exclusive take on the iconic Coca-Cola bottle with artwork by Rich Mnisi, fashion designer and leading campaigner for LGBTQIA+ rights in South Africa. His commissioned design has been sliced into individual fragments and dispersed across all 136 collectibles, making each one unique. The collection aims to shine color-filled light on the LGBTQIA+ community's members and spread a message of Love. This collection was released on Polygon and currently has a low floor price and total volume.

![Four different ways how not to release a branded NFT collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RSJZ07igKc1XkpGXT1qre.webp?height=767&width=767)

## POS System

Coca-Cola partnered with connectivity platform Omnivore to create a digital marketplace that makes it easier for customers to order Coke products through a Menu Management System (MMS) . MMS helps restaurant brands manage the complexity of numerous digital menus across online ordering, third-party apps, menu boards, kiosks, and more. MMS integrates the POS system, resulting in order injection, data collection, and control of content. This can allow for immediate pricing updates, deeper analytics, and easier surcharging.

USD is the only accepted currency on Coca-Cola’s website for US customers. Coca-Cola’s website allows for SSO via Google, Facebook, and Apple. The login for Coca-Cola’s website is the same as the app. Payment methods include traditional credit cards, Google Pay, and Paypal.

## Metrics

Because of the lack of data available from Coca-Cola’s NFT launches, Opensea’s Price History was used in favor of Dune.xyz. These metrics are included below. The metrics for more recent collections were so unimpressive and low (sub 1ETH total volume) that making a dashboard for the collections seemed like a waste of time.

## Secondary Market Analytics

(Secondary sales for Coca-Cola are the same as the original price of the only NFT sold traditionally on [Opensea.io](http://Opensea.io). The wallet that purchased the original Friendship Box NFT has not sold it yet.)

## Virtual/In-Person Events

* Coca-Cola has the World of Coca-Cola museum in Atlanta Georgia, showcasing the history of the company, as well as the Biedenharn Coca-Cola museum that serves as the original Coca-Cola bottling facility
* On International Friendship Day, Coca-Cola sponsored a ‘can-top’ party within Decentraland that was available for anyone, regardless of owning a particular NFT
* There have been no in-person events for NFT holders
* In 2022, Coca-Cola hopes to incorporate more digital experiences into their brand, with their ‘Coca-Cola Starlight’ digital collectables

## Brand Analysis

Strengths

* Has begun to embrace web3 and NFTs, using the latter as a way to promote its philanthropic ideals
* Released two different NFT collections on two separate platforms ([Opensea.io](http://Opensea.io) and VeVe), which garnered considerable hype online and generated more interest in NFTs from non-crypto consumers
* Hosted an event on Decentraland. Not NFT gated, but showing initiative and interest in the metaverse
* Is capitalizing on the nostalgic nature of the Coca-Cola brand, through NFTs and social media

Weaknesses

* Coke has made a greater effort than other soft drink brands to dabble in web3, but could be offering a lot more given the sheer breadth of the IP. Every single release has been a flop
* Needs a bigger tech team focused on NFTs and metaverse content to stay competitive and roll out new offerings quicker; Coke needs to stop releasing boring NFT collections
* There are little to no notable utilities associated with the NFTs offered, and the only notable NFT offered was sold at a price that is entirely unaffordable and unrealistic for the average consumer
* Little to no incorporation of the metaverse events or NFTs on the main website; no mention of web3 offerings on the Coca-Cola app
* IP is interested in web3 but at this point has invested very little and is cautious to invest more time and energy into the space

Opportunities

* Is easily one of the largest and most successful companies in the world, with a brand so recognizable it is hard to think of anything more cemented in American culture
* The first NFT launch was met with a ton of interest and bidding from ardent fans; Coca-Cola can recover from a poor launch in ways other brands cannot
* Digital brands are eager to partner with Coca-Cola, and the brand is being selective on how they proceed in the market

Threats

* The lack of a Coca-Cola Discord server means that any comparable competitor could beat them in the social media space just by appealing to younger audiences
* Other major soda brands could just as easily and quickly embrace web3. Nothing Coke has done is not replicable by other brands
* The success or failure of VeVe as the established and primary online platform for digital collectables could sway Coke from pursuing NFTs more seriously. VeVe was exploited in March of 2022, with the in-app token being acquired illegally by hackers. This has caused increased skepticism of the long-term viability of the VeVe platform
* Waiting for the right moment to embrace the metaverse more strongly just means another brand may take their place and gain popularity online-Repeated flops could turn long-term web3 investors away permanently

## Summary

Coca-Cola is a legendary brand that is beginning to embrace web3 and finding unique ways to incorporate it into its brand IP. Although Coke has been slow to roll-out new NFT and metaverse offerings, previous releases have been well received by the public and have not induced backlash. Coca-Cola Combo Burger Day and LGBTQIA+ releases were to practically zero fanfare, with some of the lowest floor prices seen for a major brand (consequently also on Polygon). The Coca-Cola app shows no signs of incorporating cryptocurrency or NFTs anytime soon, which could mean that full adoption for the brand is some time away. It is difficult to derive the metrics from Coke’s VeVe release, given the closed nature of the platform. With a solid IP and impressive annual gross profit, Coke can take the time it needs to decide how best to proceed in the web3 market.

 When it comes to classics, I think everyone is familiar with them. The book "Education of Love" is a classic. After reading this book, my heart was deeply shaken. Love, like air, surrounds us all the time; love is a golden key to open our hearts; love is the bridge of gratitude between people; love is a vivid life textbook... The storyline of the book "The Education of Love" moved me very much. It seemed to make me suddenly understand that love is so sacred and noble. Love includes many things, ranging from the love of the country, society, and nation, to the love of parents, teachers and students, friends, and some even to strangers. The book "Education of Love" expresses "love" incisively and vividly, and is gripping and touching everywhere. Every plot in the book can give us a philosophy of love, allowing us to have a deeper interpretation and understanding of love. There is such a story in this book: when he came to school, a first-grade pupil suddenly left his mother's hand and fell on the street. At this time, the car was coming towards him. Seeing that the child was about to be run over by the car, Lopedi jumped over boldly and dragged him out. . At this time, Mr. Principal came. Lopedi put his head on Mr. Headmaster's shoulder, his face was pale and his eyes were closed. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bSWuzG8ayse5mG0STuV_t.png?height=700&width=525)

(www.lz13.cn) After a while, a lot of people have gathered here, and they said in unison: "Lopedi! How brave! Poor child!" Yes, isn't Lopeti's great spirit of giving up his life for others and sympathy for the weak and the unfortunate, not worth learning from? From this, I thought of myself. Today, I did "Have you been in love?" "Well, I did." In the morning, my mother gave me three yuan to go out for breakfast, and when I was walking on the road, I saw an old woman with shabby clothes and gray hair. He was begging for food with a bowl. I looked at her from a distance and saw the anxious, eager look in her eyes. I ran over without hesitation and handed the three yuan to the old woman, feeling a lot of relief. Although I didn't save a life like Lopedi did, at least the three yuan can solve the old woman's breakfast! Isn't that what "love" is in the world? It is like the scent of blooming jasmine flowers, bland but pleasant. Let's love, not only the relatives and friends around us, but also more people who need care waiting for us to love. Go love, as long as everyone gives a little love, the world will become a warm world! To love, as long as this sentence is our guide to action, the world will become gorgeous! Let's love, let's make an appointment with love, and make an appointment with famous novels!

### 第六篇20220717

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】解读 $DAI - 不要让它成为 Wrapped $USDC

【核心内容简介】

MakerDAO 是一个 DeFi 借贷协议，提供两款产品：超额抵押贷款和稳定币 $DAI。借款人存入符合条件的加密抵押品，MakerDAO 将发放 $DAI 计价的贷款。作者从资产负债表变化的角度为我们梳理了 $DAI 的发展脉络。

最初协议以借贷为主体，资产负债表相对简单，即抵押贷款是资产，$DAI 是负债。需要注意 MakerDAO 没有将1 $DAI 换成1美元的法律义务。$DAI 由加密货币超额抵押贷款支持，再与1美元挂钩。

其后协议更新锚定稳定模块（Peg Stability Module, PSM），强化 $DAI 与美元币值的挂钩。这也更新了资产负债表，在资产方面除以 $DAI 计价的加密资产抵押贷款外，还增加了法定稳定币资产。在负债方面，$DAI 仍是协议的负债，由稳定币资产和加密抵押贷款共同支持。

最近协议通过 DAO 治理提案并设计信托结构来间接持有国债，在资产负债表上为 $DAI 增持了现实世界的资产与负债，有效降低了法定稳定币的敞口风险且提高了自身的盈利能力。

作者认为 $DAI 有潜力成长为真正去中心化 DAO 治理的法定稳定币，这是目前仍旧存在交易对手风险的主流中心化法定稳定币种 $USDT 和 $USDC 所不具备的优势，进而相信市场对 MakerDAO 存在价值重估的可能。

【个人思考】

$DAI 作为目前最主要的 DAO 治理类型的稳定币，补齐了缺少现实法币稳定性支持的短板，同时还具备避免中心化实体信任问题的优势，理论上有一定的发展前景。不过，中心化的法定稳定币也需要辩证看待：信任问题自诞生便潜伏，但是强力背书与资源推动却也主导了现阶段的市场份额。而且，倘若爆发中心化的交易对手风险，必然引起加密货币市场的剧烈动荡，由此会带来极高的不确定性，便不能算作好契机。由此，未来更期望看到去中心化法定稳定币的另辟蹊径，相信会是一条十分有趣的道路。

### 第七篇20220718

【输出人】@Guyue

【主题】SocialFi 深度解析：从当前市场，看未来 SocialFi 的发展

【核心内容简介】

### 现实需求

社交赛道有着巨大的市场容量，平台记录用户流量、画像和行为数据，蕴含巨大的商业价值但目前却被传统巨头公司掌控着几乎所有数据，这对用户非常不公平。传统社交产品历经了四十余年的发展，伴随网络硬件设施的升级和移动通信技术的发展不断推进社交网络的演化。数据是现有和可见未来人类社会中最主要的生产资料之一，也是反向撬动生产力的源泉。Web 3.0 改变了数据生产资料的所有权，让生产资料回归到真实生产者，进而改变社会生产关系。Web 3.0 SocialFi 将去中心化的社交和金融向结合，相比较于 Web 2.0 Social 更加强调个人影响力与变现价值，有助于打破平台垄断、消除单点风险，在全球数字经济系统的浪潮中创造全新业务模式和产品类别。

### 构建现况

去中心化的计算、存储和隐私保护是 Web 3.0 SocialFi 的关键底层设施，目前在三层设施之上已构筑起一定规模的生态。

中间件 Chainfeeds、Mask Network：Bridge 层主要以混合形态出现，既满足用户在 Web 2.0 产品使用习惯，同时也作为用户进入 Web 3.0 世界的桥梁。

公链层 Deso：建设专用于社交协议的 L1 区块链，借助链上数据的开放性、吸引开发者构建新社交应用，实现生态内的应用数据共享。

协议层 BBS Network、Cyberconnect、Lens Protocol、RSS3：共同点在于注重用户主权。

应用层 Rally.io、Nansen Connect、Mirror.xyz、Monaco Planet、Friends With Benefits、Whale：更注重现实落地，协助创作主体完成更高的价值变现。

### 发展困局

底层端：基础设施比如跨链技术、分布式存储、隐私计算等还没有完全成熟，也没有完善的跨链解决方案；社交用户迁移成本极高，用户体量还未到达爆发临界点。

Social 需求端：缺乏社交归属感；社交协议不成熟；隐私保护不完善。

DeFi 需求端：底层商业模式不成熟；用户公平性需要重新定义；价值捕获和激励方式有待完善。

### 发展破局

1）使用成本低，普通用户可以承受；

2）带给用户不逊色于 Web 2.0 的产品体验，上手使用门槛低，产品功能完善并且有创新；

3）用户数据同步及时全面（可集成链上和链下）；

4）创新的市场营销策略，有快速传播机制；

5）平衡合理的 Token 经济，可以在生态中充分发挥 Token 的作用 ；

6）持续的激励机制和成熟的社区运营来加强用户粘性；

7）与其他赛道的协议打通，赋能更多的场景；

8）满足 Web 3.0 原生需求，而非仅解决 Web 2.0 需求。

### 展望未来

Web 3.0 社交可以解决 Web 2.0 社交存在的数据所有权问题、数据隐私问题和利益分配问题。在 Web 3.0 信息自由和信息确权的浪潮中，用户可以自己掌握内容的所有权而以不依赖中心化平台；传统身份 ID 体系是邮箱账号、用户名密码和真实用户信息，而 Web 3.0 的 ID 体系需要关注 DID 和 SBT 可能在未来实现真正的灵魂绑定。

值得关注的还有：公链层生态及其潜在价值；Bridge 层基于链和 Dapp 的交互，通用的 DID 或 SBT 在未来帮助更多用户从 Web 2.0 带入 Web 3.0 时代；协议层基于链下和链上数据，用户获取更高价值的专属画像；应用层注重实现成员之间的价值连接，通过兴趣发现和垂直社区，完善社交图谱。

当前的大多数 SocialFi 产品只能满足 Crypto Native 用户纯链上的社交+金融需求，未来需要广泛普及且能同时满足链上和映射链下真实世界社交+金融需求的 SocialFi 产品，可以帮助用户将社交融入到生活的方方面面，当令人愉悦的 SocialFi 与基本的人际关系巧妙地结合在一起时，Web 3.0 会变得更加强大，最终以更为真实和积极的方式在这个世界构建相互的联系。

【个人思考】

Web 3.0 SocialFi 在未来有着无可估量的发展潜能，但现阶段在公链层、协议层和应用层的生态构建只能说是初具雏形，想要破局成熟完备的 Web 2.0 体系仍需极强的实力与更好的契机。个人可以关注 DID 和 SBT 在未来有关灵魂绑定的切实落地，相信这会是 Web 3.0 ID 的专属钥匙，也期望能够持续打开去中心化社交的建设格局，有朝一日真正实现 SocialFi 的构想。

title: Live happily in the moment
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CkKpB6xHckFFs4ipRWRUe.png?height=270&width=336)

A friend bought a pen and paper and inkstone, and asked me to inscribe a few words for him to hang it on the living room of his new home to patch the wall. This made me feel a little embarrassed, because I knew that my handwriting was not good-looking, not to mention that I hadn't written calligraphy for many years.

My friend said, "What are you afraid of? I feel honored to hang your name. I am not afraid anymore. What are you afraid of?"

In front of my friends, I unfolded the paper, polished the ink, and wrote the words "I often think about one or two".

The friend said, "What does this mean?"

I said, "It means that my handwriting is not good. If you see this handwriting, please bear with me, think about one or two things that are good for me, and then forgive me."

Seeing my joking attitude, my friend said, "What do you mean by being serious?"

"As the saying goes, 'unsatisfactory things happen nine times out of ten', the unsatisfactory things in our life account for the vast majority, so living is painful. If we want to live a happy life, we must always think about the good things that one or two are, so that we will feel fortunate and know how to cherish them, and we will not be overwhelmed by the unsatisfactory.”

When my friend heard it, he was very happy and went home with "Changing Thinking One or Two".

2

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bHmXdME6kUAoHL0MreJ-p.png?height=294&width=391)

A few months later, he came to visit me and asked me for words again, saying: "I am tired and angry in the office every day, and I am very happy when I come home and see the picture of 'I often think about a thing or two'. But the walls are too big, and the words appear to be too large. Too small, you can write a few more words!"

For good friends, I have always been responsive to requests, so I wrote the second couplet "I don't think about eight or nine" for "I often think about one or two", and wrote a horizontal batch of "Ruyi" on it, and I drew a freehand vase of flowers in the middle.

Unexpectedly, after a few months, I was troubled by many bizarre legends and rumors. A friend called one day and said that he was sitting in front of the words I wrote in the living room, and he said, "I can't think of anything to comfort you, so I will read your own words to you: I often think about one or two, don't think about it. Eight or nine, everything goes well!"

When I received a call from a friend, I was very moved. I often feel that it is easy to add icing on the cake in other people's festivities, but it is very difficult to help others in the misery. Those who can't help in the snow are not true friends, let alone those who fall into the trap.

3

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6FVHp2Nc-anERvaO2KFuS.png?height=430&width=304)

However, after a person reaches the age of forty, he has probably exercised the ability to "not be frightened by humiliation" in his life, and he will not care about the icing on the cake, the help in the snow, or the downfall. That is because we have already experienced the pain and setbacks of life, and we have also experienced many emotional encounters and separations, and we are slowly searching for positive, happy, and positive visualizations in our life. This kind of visualization is exactly the visualization of "often thinking one or two".

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w2TIfwQEFjiZDJH5H9_44.png?height=430&width=304)

The visualization of "thinking about one or two often" is to look for a ray of dawn in the heavy dark clouds; it is to open up some quiet news in the rolling red dust; it is to surface when you are on the verge of suffocation, and there is a deep breath .

Life is already hard enough. If we add up the unsatisfactory events of fifty years, it will definitely make it difficult for us. Life and feelings are in misery, and sometimes it is helpless, but if even thoughts and feelings are in misery, it is asking for trouble and adding to the misery.

4

Since I was a child, I liked to read the biographies and memoirs of big people, and I slowly concluded a formula: all big people suffer, and their lives are almost the true testimony of "unhappy things in life", but when they face hardships They can also maintain positive thinking and can "think one or two often". Finally, they transcend suffering, and suffering becomes the most fertile nutrient for life.

What moved me was not their suffering, because suffering is everywhere; what moved me was their perseverance, optimism and courage in the face of suffering.

It turns out that "good luck" or "unsatisfactory" is not determined by the fate of life, but by the moment of thought.

It turns out that it is not "eight or nine" that determines the quality of life, but "one or two".

It turns out that suffering is measured in quantity for those who fall into it, but becomes quality for those who transcend. Quantity accumulates and quality activates.

Since the joys and sorrows of life are just processes, why should we give up our own thoughts to cater to each process?

Just live happily in the moment, let every moment be affectionate, righteous, glowing, and poetic!

title: 生活，坦然面对，微笑前行
body:
“生活予我以痛，我却报之以歌。”因为热爱，既是生活的一种态度，也是人生的一种选择。

人生的路，需要我们一点点去摸索，别人能给的只是一些建议，路还得自己来走。生活在这个复杂的时代，我们每个人都不容易，但千万别放弃，只要在变好的路上，即使慢一些，又有什么关系呢！ 
 

真正的幸福，是来源于对生活的感悟，而并非是通过对比来获得的优越感；真正的美好，是来源于对生活的理解，而并非是通过点缀来获得的成就感。

人生短短几十载，无需太过执着，珍惜当下所拥有的，看淡已经逝去的，学会接受所有的不如意，并以微笑为生活的方向，才配得上最美的景色。

谋生的路上，不忘初心，方得始终；谋爱的路上，不卑不亢，方得未来。于繁华中保持谦逊内敛，于平淡中保持安然自在。 
 

人生，究其根本，就是一个修心的过程。内心坚定者，给复杂以简单，给匮乏以丰富；内心浮躁者，以外在为美好，以物质为追求。所以，学会享受心灵的愉悦，简单的快乐，这才是生活该有的模样。

真正美好的事物，往往不取决于事物本身，而取决于欣赏者的心境。就像两个人欣赏同一轮夕阳，有的人，看到的是自己剩余不多的时光；有的人，则看到夕阳西下的美好的画面。所以，只有自我的境界高了，生活才能看得开，路才能走得远。

人生起起伏伏，才有美感。如果总是一成不变，这样的生活是很乏味的。坦然面对，微笑前行，才是对待生活最好的方式。

title: 2022最新文案，简单干净，人人点赞！
body:
一、做个俗人，谈笑风生不动情，从此放下离愁，生生世世酒敬自由。

二、没有谁能左右你的情绪，只有你自己不放过自己，不要再熬夜了，谁心里没有故事，只是学会了控制。

三、如果别人要的，超越自己的能力范围，那就不要给了，早点离别，如果别人给的，超越别人的实力范围，最好不要接受，毕竟还不起。

四、避免尴尬又让能让自己开心的方法：不要每次都高估了自己在别人心里的位置。 
 

五、不亏待每一份热情，不讨好任何的冷漠。一旦攒够了失望，就离开。从此再也不见，友情如此，爱情亦如此。

六、不是你的，就不要挽留；让你难受的，就别再将就。若人走情凉，就守心自暖；若聚散难免，便独享浮世清欢。从前不回头，往后不将就。这，才是你应该过的人生。

七、人生不就是这样么，这里缺一块，那里补一下，填填补补，最后求一个圆满。所谓圆满，从来都是自己给自己的。 
 

八、人总要找点事情做，让自己忙起来，忙起来才知道生活不易，才明白平时的忧伤都是矫情。

九、总会有那么一个人，陪你完成你沒有完成的心愿，给你送花，陪你看日出日落，陪你走长江大桥，陪你玩旋转木马，最后陪你共度余生，你要等。

十、成年人的平和，一半是理解，一半是算了。 
 

十一、人生是自己的，不要活在别人的眼神和口水里。不是所有的言论都需要别人理解，不是所有的选择都需要别人支持。

十二、直觉这个东西还是挺准的，你能察觉到的所有怠慢、轻蔑，你感受到的所有不再喜欢、不再关心，并不是因为敏感，而是切切实实的事实。

十三、姑娘，踏入社会的时候，该收一收你那脾气了。不要什么话都跟别人讲，你说的是心里话，他们听的是笑话。 
 

十四、人的一生注定会遇到两个人，一个惊艳了时光，一个温柔了岁月。

十五、你做的再好，也还是有人指指点点；你即便一塌糊涂，也还是有人唱赞歌。所以不必掉进他人的眼神，你需要讨好的，仅仅是你自己。

十六、世上还有很多美好的事物等着你，别抱怨、更不要放弃，所以你要内心温柔，安静努力。 
 

十七、丧太简单了，顶着一切依旧热爱生活才是真的酷，祝我们都能在鸡零狗碎的生活里找到自己的快乐。

十八、那些离开你的人，无论当初是出于什么原因离开的，也许他犹豫过挣扎过不舍过，但至少在他决定要走的那一瞬间，他觉得没有你，他会过得更好。

十九、别跟不喜欢你的人套近乎，别跟你不喜欢的人废话，把有限的时间，浪费在美好的人身上。 
 

二十、当个成年人好累啊，遇到问题哭完了还得想着怎么解决。

二一、你要明白，再烫手的水还是会凉，再温饱的热情还是会退散，再爱的人还是会分开。所以你要乖，要长大，不再张口就是，来日方长，而要习惯人走茶凉

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
body:
"The Count of Monte Cristo" Throughout the ages, there have been countless popular novels in the world, but there are very few excellent works. Among them, Alexandre Dumas' "The Count of Mount Chito" can be said to be one of the best. The number of readers he has is a testament to his worth, and there is no doubt that The Earl of Mount Keto is one of the great examples of popular fiction. There are as many as 100 Alexandre Dumas novels, most of which are based on the real history as the background and the adventures of the protagonist as the content. The unusual ideal hero, the dramatic development of the storyline, the tense fighting action, the clear and clear complete structure, the vivid and powerful language, the flexible and witty dialogue and so on constitute the characteristics of Dumas' novels. The story is about an innocent man who is deliberately framed and wrongly held, but he takes revenge on those who have betrayed him with a well-planned scheme. Edmund Dantes, an active young sailor, is an honest and honest young man. But his peaceful life and his plans to marry the beautiful Mercedes were suddenly disrupted. Because his best friend, Fernand, also wants to marry Mercedes and has been cheating on Dantes. This "good friend", in order to frame Dantes, devised a trap together with Tangeral, who had a grudge against Dantes, slandering his connection with Napoleon, so that Dantes was taken by the police at the wedding banquet. He was wrongfully tried by Judge Villefort, who imprisoned him in the infamous Prison of Ifo Castle on the Isle of Ifo Edmund Dantes lived there for thirteen years of nightmares. However, during the period, he met the same old priest Faria who was framed. He learned a lot from the priest and launched his own enemies. With the help of Faria, Dantes planned and successfully escaped from the prison. He found the treasure left to him by Faria, and became a mysterious and wealthy "Count of Monte Cristo". With his wit and ruthlessness, he subtly squeezed into the upper class of France. He repaid his benefactors and made those who had manipulated and enslaved him pay a huge price step by step. When the revenge was over, he raised his eyebrows. Yuanfan, left France forever! Speaking of the features of this work, I think there are four most important ones. The first is the plot twists and the arrangement is reasonable. Generally speaking, successful novel tutors have twists and turns in plots and ups and downs, and Chidushan's Enmity and Vengeance is exemplary in this regard, and the novel attracts the attention of readers as soon as the novel opens. Edmund has just returned, young and promising, ready to get married, and acting captain, and has a bright future. It was his enemy, Tangeral, who was jealous of him, so he joined hands with his rival in a play, causing Edmund to suffer miserably, while the prosecutor, Villefort, put him in prison for protecting his father. This dramatic opening officially sets the stage for what follows. Later, Edmund's description in the black prison is even more impressive, and it is one of the most exciting parts of the book. Later, he actually cheated with the dead and escaped from the black prison. At this point, the readers hold their breaths, applauding the author's fantastic idea. However, this is only a prelude. Later he got the treasure and became a billionaire, the name is Earl of Mount Kedo. After that, it was his revenge. The novel is mainly about revenge. Dumas' ingenuity lies in the fact that the three revenges are written differently, each with its own interest, but it is also related to the occupation and criminal nature of the three enemies. And the different outcomes of revenge keep the plot from being rigid, making people feel full of changes, and readers can't expect such an ending. After reading it, and thinking about it again, there is indeed no better ending, so I can't help but admire the author's clever arrangement. Alexandre Dumas was not satisfied with the bizarre twists and turns of the basic plot, because the length of the story was too long, and only such a simple plot would still appear monotonous, so he interspersed a lot of thrilling scenes, such as the green forest hero haunting near Rome, using the carnival The festival carried out kidnapping activities; Madame Villefort poisoned people for her property, and Caderousse entered the Count's house to steal at night... The danger survived, with the artistic effect of peaks, twists and turns, and ups and downs, but it was not detached from the theme, Influence Center. This kind of big story set with small stories is just right. Every episode is very exciting and compact, and it serves the theme. For example, the expedition on the island written in the middle seems to have nothing to do with the theme, but it is The enemy's child, Albert... It is these little stories that make the plot complex but not sloppy, and it is only exciting to read, not boring. The second artistic feature of Monte Cristo's Enmity and Enmity is that it is bizarre and melted into one furnace. The novel touches on a wide range of society, ranging from the court of Louis XVIII, to the feasting and feasting of the upper class, to the gloomy and dreadful prison and the dark psychology of the prisoners, the robbers of the green forest, and the poor life of the citizens. description. The novel is by no means a sweeping scan of all social classes, but a certain depth of portrayal. For example, when describing the court, the author wrote in a few strokes the characteristics of Louis XVIII himself and his court fashion and the high society reception is even more wonderful and appropriate. He is also unique in his description of the lower society. His detailed description shows the prison life that ordinary readers do not know. Even the description of the inmates' discourse shows that the author also understands the scum of these societies. (www.lz13.cn) In addition, Alexandre Dumas's exotic writing is also very wonderful. It is the organic combination of this colorful society and exotic local customs that shows Dumas's broad vision and romantic artistic taste in a fusion of skills. This feature is also closely related to the legend of the novel. The third artistic feature is: complete structure and rich language. The structure of Jidushan's Enmity and Vengeance is very clear. The first half is a wedge, and it is this wedge that leads to the subsequent plot of revenge. Although the subsequent revenge plot is three clues, but they intersect each other, the narrative is methodical, the writing is interlocking, and the steps are in-depth. The author has achieved a strict, compact and clear structure in this article, and has produced a coherent effect. Alexandre Dumas is also very good at writing dialogues between characters. Eight-tenths of the whole story is made up of dialogues, but it does not feel rigid, but more fluent and natural. From the dialogue of each character, the character of the character can be seen. And even the narration of the past events is composed of dialogues, like the reappearance of the past events, vivid and natural. This is also one of the great successes of Monte Cristo's Vengeance. The last feature is: clear image and outstanding personality. I think it goes without saying that those who have read it will not forget those distinctive characters! Whether it's the old priest Faria or the Count of Monte Cristo, those characters are already deeply imprinted in your heart, aren't they? In a word, The Count of Monte Cristo is a good example of popular fiction. I think it is necessary for us to have a good taste. It will be of great help to our future writing and reading.

title: Solidity极简入门: 38. NFT交易所
去中心化不等于去人性化：浅谈我对Mimic Shhans和Soulda的观察
body:
我的NFT学习之路：

* 6月30日买了两只[@MimicShhans](https://twitter.com/MimicShhans)
* 7月1日FreeMint1只国产项目（后续活动又获得一只空投）
* 7月12日购入两只[@Soulda16Club](https://twitter.com/Soulda16Club)

这三个项目是我做为NFT新手购入的第一笔、第二笔、第三笔“资产”，将近20天时间里，我在这三个项目的社区里蹲获了非常有趣的不同的观察体验。

## 观察一：Mimic Shhans

我个人非常喜欢猫，在Twitter上闲逛的时候无意中看到有人推送这只猫，画风简单却灵动，一下被击中，在Opensea买了两只，这是我的第一笔NFT投资，也就此加入了中文猫猫社区。

从社区互动中逐渐了解到项目的历程：艺术家是位70后韩国上班族，在此项目前已经利用业余时间画了4年猫，之前有过6个NFT项目（不如mimic成功），Mimic Shhans这个项目是他和表弟两人手动一张一张从Opensea上传上架开启0元购。

手工逐张上传到Opensea？这点让我大吃一惊，在GitHub上可以找到无数NFT生成器与智能合约的当下，这种行为无异于在浮躁的市场中有人精心为你调制了一杯手冲咖啡，每一杯（每只猫）都显得如此独一无二。

艺术家对猫的热爱是真诚的，对人也是真诚的。他是项目方吗？实质上毋庸置疑。他是项目方吗？在社区中，我却感觉到他只是社区粒子中的一份子，无数初衷或爱猫或逐利的粒子逐渐缠绕互动，其中的驱动力恰好是艺术家独有的努力，坚持，真诚，这些是一种可以被众人所观察到的能量。

这种能量转化成一种力量，让每个置身与此的人感到喜悦与认同。与此同时，社区中很多holder聪敏，果敢，行动力非凡，所有精妙的点子碰触到真诚开放的艺术家，激发出大象牙膏般壮观的效果。

优秀的人总会吸引同样优秀的人。

## 观察二：某国产项目

在预热期这个项目做的还不错，对热门项目的仿盘，画风尚可，WL和空投也搞的非常热闹。做为第一次从合约中直接FreeMint的实验，我只mint了一张，但这张的稀有度却非常高，让我有了兴趣继续蹲点这个社区，观察后期发展。

然而MINT后的运营操作却让我大无语：

1、项目方第一次进Space，在场发言人很给面子的cx了一番，把麦让给项目方，项目方足足重复了近10遍“谁说我们会rug的？我告诉你们我们不会rug！”，却只字不提项目解析，规划，哪怕是他们的自我认知。听了一场Space对项目方留下模糊的印象：他们在努力，虽然我还没看到；
2、在项目社区里反复强调，“社区是大家的，我们是CC0，抬价靠你们！”，在后期的接触中发现社区内甚至有不少官方水军，甚至不止一言不合就将holder踢出群；
3、做出了一些非常web2.0的运营活动，从感官上为了做活动而做，cx的非常生硬；
4、关于扫地板活动，对内也做了很多鸡贼的操作；
5、大家长式的一手强硬规划，却近乎强迫的让holder去执行；

这个项目方现在还在吗？还在。努力吗？大概吧。

这是一个让我想起淘宝直播间/拼多多/抖音快手电商的项目，最近看到他们已经开始疯狂蹭某个热门项目的热度，蹭的方法也是令人扶额。

还是希望他们能好吧。

## 观察三：Soulda

依旧是在Twitter接触到的Soulda项目，遇到的时候已经过了WL采集，但我依旧被吸引，并一步步做完了他们的MBTI测试。

画风独特，soul blue jazz 自我，这是我从NFT视觉中获得的第一眼感知，很喜欢。华丽的官网也让我觉得这大概是一个短期内不会跑路的项目，他们好像真的想要做点什么事。

于是在二级市场低价接盘了2个Soulda，并加入了社区。

从某天开始，soulda被cx到了猫猫社群，感受型的用户开始大量重合，项目开始逐渐又被cx到Twitter，地板价一天内从0.01x涨到了0.3x。

Soulda社区的共识萌芽是什么？是画风，是感受。MBTI做为一个老套的性格测试被赋予了视觉化感知：这是我，这是我们，你看，这是我们的灵魂。

互联网中的灵魂是游移的，暴涨的地板价加剧了这种无序发散。大量短期逐利者的涌入逐渐稀释初始凝聚力，而官方若即若离的态度，也让很多人开始困惑。比如：为什么不是官方社区而是非官方社区，它可靠吗？

这也是我的困惑点，官方本身是有社区的，出于各种原因他们关闭了它。授权了一个自发社区。等等，为什么不是授权给mod去运营官方社区呢？为什么不干脆删除官方社区呢？为什么要在最基础的“是不是官方”这种感知上创造一个门槛呢？

我的另一个困惑点是，我仿佛观察不到项目方。

他们有在努力做事，有在专注于下一步，他们在mod需要的时候努力配合提供奖品或其他。但用户和项目方之间，始终隔了一层mod。这没问题，但，这也是问题。

我感受不到项目方的“人性”，他们太模糊了。

共识源于认知，认知源于观察，观察需要有观察对象。观察对象必须是个鲜活的明确，人与灵魂的触碰，很难全凭代理。

Soulda的holder是一群非常有趣的人，他们乐于分享，乐于创造，早期的摇soulda.gif在社区里玩的非常开心。制作周边，组织聚会，寻找twins活动等，holder的共识仍然在成长。

希望Soulda项目方成员能更多的来参与互动，聊一聊他们在艺术，技术方面的畅想，插科打诨，和社区成员成为朋友。它是一个非常好的项目，我仍然坚定的持有它。希望它可以走的很远。

**将近20天的NFT学习，能让我遇到至少上述中的2个好项目，相信这是我的新手光环，要走的路还长，要学的东西还多。**

# Giới thiệu về SiO2 Finance

**SiO2 Finance** là trung tâm cho vay đa máy ảo trên **Astar** cho Polkadot. Chúng tôi mong muốn trở thành sản phẩm cho vay tốt nhất với trải nghiệm người dùng tuyệt vời, các tính năng một cú nhấp chuột dễ sử dụng và quản trị minh bạch.

# Chuẩn bị ví cho Тestnet.

Thêm mạng thử nghiệm vào ví **Metamask** của bạn bằng cách sử dụng mẫu sau:

Nhấp vào **“Thêm mạng”** và thêm thông tin!

Tên mạng: **Astar_shibuya**

URL RPC mới: [https://evm.shibuya.astar.network](https://evm.shibuya.astar.network/)

ID chuỗi: **81**

Ký hiệu tiền tệ: **SBY**

URL Block Explorer: [https://shibuya.subscan.io](https://shibuya.subscan.io/)

Ví MetaMask của bạn đã sẵn sàng để sử dụng trong Mạng Astar!

# Bắt đầu testnet

**Bước đầu tiên**

Chúng tôi truy cập trang web chính thức và kết nối ví thử nghiệm của mình - <https://shibuya.sio2.finance/>

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pPIhh5aiPjAi37ngLk9EO.png?height=766&width=1400)

**Bước thứ hai**

Trong menu trên cùng của trang web, hãy nhấp vào nút “ **Faucet**” và yêu cầu mã thông báo thử nghiệm.

### 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BMDFlR6_J6-hkcFk7stmj.png?height=769&width=1400)

Bạn sẽ cần mã thông báo **SBY** để thanh toán hoa hồng, hãy truy cập [trang web](https://portal.astar.network/#/assets) này và yêu cầu nó theo hướng dẫn trong ảnh chụp màn hình.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7MXAdUk6vdL93HOtSOMHz.png?height=771&width=1400)

**Bước thứ ba**

Bây giờ, hãy truy cập trang “ **Bảng điều khiển** ” và nhấp vào nút “ **Supply** ” trong tiền điện tử bạn đã chọn. “ **APY cung cấp** ” cho biết tỷ lệ phần thưởng từ lãi suất. “ **Supply APR** ” cho biết phần thưởng khai thác thanh khoản từ các mã thông báo SIO2.

Tiếp theo, nhập số lượng bạn muốn cung cấp và nhấn **“Supply”.**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dpD5rr5oT1sRGAWpfETB2.png?height=767&width=1400)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8mxppcePPBG-YpMr_qh-2.png?height=1248&width=924)

Làm tương tự với WETH, BTC

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bPG_vClgCWtMhglpINx1E.png?height=766&width=1400)

**Bước thứ tư**

title: Danger of web 3 security risks
body:
### New internet, new hardware devices, powerful security

The birth of the internet which is a new kind of technology in the 21st century has become a powerful tool ever created and brought into existence by man. It is a powerful tool because it has the ability to run from one planet to another planet with just a simple input by man.

Imagine the internet, that is web 3.0 as a black box or an emergency satchel like the one which the president of the United States is given to authorize a nuclear attack on another country farther away from its initial location. The internet functions that way but this time, one’s identity or codes can be secure for taking such actions.

The internet has become the mother and father of all technology because it has the ability and capacity to produce any type of value good or bad that can be consumed by the people who use the technology or internet. I consider the internet as a huge globe or universe but inside there are two small box-like planet both functioning identically though one is not secure and the other is secure for example web 2.0 and web 3.0.

When the world is evolving or re-creating itself into something new, society always develops and creates something new that will function in that world or anything that goes hand-in-hand with the new world. For instance, web 3.0 is a new technology, but decentralized and therefore new hardware devices are needed for a decentralized technology. And I mean hardware devices that has a 5th generation technology standard and high connectivity to work with web 3.0 technology because the old devices may have malicious software which we are unaware of and therefore corrupting any input data or information as well as application that we may want to download.

There is nothing in the world that does not need security, living and non-living things has some sort of security that protects them from anything malicious likewise machines. Security is paramount. powerful security is gold. It is the only thing that can keep everything in place and secure. Web 3.0 is not just about NFTs, trade in the blockchain, but it is really about security. That means people who utilize this new technology can do whatever they want in that space while their personal identifiable information and data is secure and protected in the blockchain for example, the dark web.

### Security and web 3.0 Vulnerabilities

It is impossible to build a world or a planet without putting strong foundational security in place otherwise everything that is built in the world or planet would crumble to the ground. Yes, technology is a powerful tool in the world but does not mean it has the best security in the world. Every new emerging technology that is built, and brought into existence always comes with all kinds of weakness or vulnerabilities.

The most powerful tool in the world that has the best security in place is the human mind. A strong mind has the ability to secure sensitive data and information within itself if it is properly guarded by whomever carries that mind, and builds a secure world from it’s mind free from weakness or vulnerability. How is this part of the paragraph related to web 3.0?, well we all know web 3.0 means decentralization therefore data must be decentralized and encrypted that only the owner has access to it. But sometimes we cannot 100% trust the internet, hence web 3.0 even though it is decentralized due to malicious actors and software in that space.

There is a misconception about web 3.0 which is that, because it is a decentralize technology therefore no malicious actors or hackers, scammers cannot steal sensitive data and information from anyone who ventures into the space of web 3.0. Unfortunately, that is a very wrong understanding because malicious actors can definitely steal data. Now let’s dive into the security risks of web 3.0 and provide some solutions how to better protect our data and information from bad actors.

* **Social engineering**:- Of course adapting to the new internet or technology always open the way for exploitation and threat of social engineering therefore web 3.0 is no exception. Individuals who intend to explore or venture in the web 3.0 space must be extremely careful not to get tricked into providing sensitive information such as their secret recovery phrase, passcode, or any PII that can access their wallet or data. An example of social engineering is phishing attack where an attacker masquerades him/herself as a reputable person or company through emails. The solution here is never to share PII or secret recovery phrase when asked by anyone even an autobot through emails or text messages.
* **Malware**:- Attackers can create their own malware such as a trojan horse which may distinguish as a legitimate software. And the attacker can implement the malware in any web 3.0 platform for anyone to mess around with it for example gaming, and music platforms. Another thing is attackers can deploy malicious smart contract onto the blockchain without anyone knowing he/she is signing onto a malicious smart contract because it does functions like a standard smart contract except that it is fake. It is important an individual verifies the source of the smart contract they would be signing by confirming the information written in the smart contract are legitimate.
* **ENS**:- ENS here stands for Ethereum name service domain. I honestly never thought that cybercriminals could use the ENS to track an individual’s Ethereum address just by searching their simple names associated with their Ethereum address. Mr. Luis Monzon said it better when he wrote about the 5 most common security concerns for the web 3.0 world. He stated that, “*the growing popularity of digital currency has resulted in greater use of Ethereum Name Service (ENS) domains. ENS domains are an easy to remember name used to find the associated cryptocurrency wallet address. This has led to popular domain names being trademarked and resold by third parties. As a result, nothing prevents the owner of an ENS domain from using that name to trick unsuspecting users into believing that they are dealing with a legitimate organization*” I believe the solution in this case is owning your ENS that is associated with the wallet address and locking it in the blockchain with a private key.

It is concluded and noted that web 3.0 technology is still in the early age, growing, and fresh out of the womb of web 2.0 technology though a very interesting and exciting blockchain technology. The best thing about web 3.0 technology is that it gives freedom to creators to do whatever they want with their creativity, art, and intellectual property in the blockchain while the technology offers security with the input of our private keys because it is a decentralize machine. I believe that as the technology is growing, we will be experiencing more security risks in the future. Therefore, let us be ready to do more work to secure our data and information just in case those upcoming security risks present itself.

### Reference

Monzon, Luis. (2022, April 16). The 5 most common security concerns for the web 3.0 world.

[https://www.itnewsafrica.com/2022/04/the-5-most-common-security-concerns-for-the-web-3-0-world/](https://www.itnewsafrica.com/2022/04/the-5-most-common-security-concerns-for-the-web-3-0-world/)
